Sentencas: Perovskites containing lanthanides, partially substituted by alkaline-earth elements and transition metals like Cr, Ti, Fe or Co show a very broad range of physical properties.
Titulo: Chromite/titanate based perovskites for application as anodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Therefore several perovskite materials, based on lanthanum chromite and strontium titanate were synthesised and investigated with regard to their application as anodes in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Chromite/titanate based perovskites for application as anodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The perovskite powders were studied by thermogravimetric and differential thermal analysis (TG/DTA) and X-ray diffraction (XRD), Conductivity data in the range of 100-900 degreesC and the thermal expansion behaviour were measured both in air and Ar-4%H(2).
Titulo: Chromite/titanate based perovskites for application as anodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrochemical properties of a screen-printed electrode were studied preliminary as function of the hydrogen partial pressure using impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Chromite/titanate based perovskites for application as anodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this group of materials high electronic conductivity of up to 60 S/cm at 900 degreesC was observed, However, none of the materials investigated so far showed a combination of the advantageous properties and is therefore superior to the state-of-the-art Ni-YSZ anode.
Titulo: Chromite/titanate based perovskites for application as anodes in solid oxide fuel cells
